formula: The e.g.f. equals log(2(x+1)^2/(x^2+2x+2)), which has compositional inverse sqrt(exp(x)/(2-exp(x))) - 1. See A014307. - _Peter Bala_, Mar 23 2013a(n) ~ 2 * (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015
mathematica: With[{nn=30},CoefficientList[Series[Log[1+Tanh[Log[1+x]]],{x,0,nn}], x]Range[0,nn]!] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 27 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[Log[2 - 2/(2 + x*(2 + x))], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015 *)
